title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.9 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the job title and business address of the
records access officer and of the person to whom appeals shall be made, and the
location where records can be seen or copied, shall be posted in a conspicuous
location wherever records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2050.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
